function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Positive signal for SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater samples indicates viral presence.","Impact":"Risk of wastewater contamination leading to potential exposure to SARS-CoV-2.","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust sanitation and disinfection measures at the wastewater treatment facility.","Technologies":"Advanced water treatment systems, UV disinfection, and chlorine-based disinfectants.","People":"Workers at the wastewater treatment facility, nearby residents, and laboratory personnel.","Owner":"Wastewater treatment facility management and local health authorities."},{"Description":"Identification of SARS-CoV-2 genetic material in sewage poses a risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential spread of SARS-CoV-2 through exposure to contaminated wastewater.","Mitigation":"Enhanced public health education, implementation of protective measures during sewage handling, and regular testing of wastewater for virus presence.","Technologies":"Real-time monitoring systems for wastewater, personal protective equipment (PPE), and wastewater treatment technologies.","People":"Wastewater treatment workers, public health officials, and local community members.","Owner":"Public health authorities, wastewater management authorities, and local government."}]}
